nodes.text: Kindlabethia was a planet in the Braxant sector of the Outer Rim.

Kindlabethia was only mentioned in Luke Skywalker and the Shadows of Mindor, where it is said that a routing clerk "quietly offered for sale, to select parties from Kindlabethia to Nar Shaddaa, a hint to the route of the Corellian Queen's upcoming cruise..."
